summary: This mod fixes the problem where escorted prisoners didn\'t use the weapon you give them when you try to free them.
descriptionHtml:
Language on the screens is Polish but this mod works with any language version. :)

This Mod aids to fix the problem with random encountered prisoners, escorted by thalmor/imperials/stormcloacks, never using the equipment you gave them. Now they should i tried it one time and it worked but i need more feedback.

For now they only use weapons you give them (more realistic and for now i don\'t know how to force them to use armor).


 THIS MOD WILL WORK ONLY FOR FRESH RESPAWNED PRISONERS (If You have save game with spawned prisoner he won\'t be affected).
You can also find it here
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=13568

Hisotry:
v. 1.0
started the mod
v 1.1
fixed issue where prisoners were always equipped with stormcloaks armor
v 1.2
hopefully fixed issue where prisoners escorted by imperial soldier still didn\'t used equipment ;)


If You like my mod please endorse it ;)
author: Pejot
